    • Method Detail

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Description copied from interface: Connection
        Dispose the connection

        A dispose will also act as a disconnect.

        Connections must be disposed in order to clean up all resources. In the past the Connection.disconnect() call was enough and, if possible, most resources (sockets) should be closed when disconnecting. Still some resources can be re-used and these need to be cleaned up in the Connection.dispose() call.

        Specified by:
        dispose in interface Connection
        Overrides:
        dispose in class ClientBaseConnection

      • onConnectionClosed

        protected void onConnectionClosed()
        Description copied from class: ClientBaseConnection
        Called when the connection got closed

        This method is called while the connection lock is held.

        The default implementation does nothing.

        Overrides:
        onConnectionClosed in class ConnectionBaseImpl

      • acknowledge

        public  acknowledge(java.lang.String monitorId,
                java.util.Date aknTimestamp,
                OperationParameters operationParameters,
                CallbackHandler callbackHandler)
        Description copied from interface: Connection
        Acknowledge the monitor if the akn state was reached at or before the provided timestamp
        Parameters:
        monitorId - the id of the condition
        aknTimestamp - the timestamp up to which the state may be acknowledged
        operationParameters - optionally provide some user information which performs the aknowledgement. If the information is not provided the current logged in user will be used. If the information is present but the current logged in user is not allowed to change the user performing acknowledgement the server may fall back to use the actual information of the logged in user instead.

      • handleMessage

        protected void handleMessage(java.lang.Object message)
        Description copied from class: ClientBaseConnection
        Handle a message that came in by the current session.

        Note that the method is called while holding the lock the connection itself.

        Overrides:
        handleMessage in class ConnectionBaseImpl
        Parameters:
        message - the received message
